questions.correction:
Feed Conversion Ratio (FCR)<br>
= (Mass gained)/(Mass of feed)<br>
= Mass Gained = 45kg – 25kg = 20kg<br>
= Mass of feed = 60kg<br>
= FCR = 20602060<br>
= 1313<br>
= 1 : 3

Calculate the area of the farmland.
questions.correction:
The shape of the farmland is similar to a trapezium. Therefore, to calculate the area of the farmland the formula to use is 

     1/2(a+b)h

  =1/2(70m+90m)45m

  =1/2(160m)45m

  =1/2(7200m)

  =3600m2

To convert from m2 to ha, divide by 10,000

  =3600÷ 10000

  =0.36ha
